item.title: An introduction for Git
item.author: Author
item.description: Git Cli Install If you facing this ERROR message (bash: gh: command not found), please following this document installing gh on your Linux first. Below section, I will tell you how to use Make to management your package. 1 sudo pacman -S github-cli Login Step1: 1 2 3 4 [yanboyang713@Boyang-PC dotfiles]$ gh auth login ? What account do you want to log into? [Use arrows to move, type to filter] > GitHub.
